entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
